column1: Albanian: minare  Azeri: minarə  Bashkir: манара ‎(manara)  Belarusian: мінарэ́т ‎(minarét)  Bulgarian: минаре ‎(minare)
column3: Dutch: minaret  English: minaret  French: minaret  Hungarian: minaret  Kazakh: мұнара ‎(munara)
column5: Kyrgyz: мунара ‎(munara)  Persian: مناره ‎(menâre)  Polish: minaret  Russian: минаре́т ‎(minarét)  Spanish: minarete or alminar
column7: Swahili: mnara  Tajik: манора ‎(manora)  Tatar: манара ‎(manara)  Turkish: minare  Turkmen: minara
column9: Ukrainian: мінаре́т ‎(minarét)  Urdu: مینار ‎(mīnār)  Uyghur: مىنارەت ‎(minaret)  Uzbek: minora
